basics.name: NIZAR AJROUD
basics.label: DevOps Specialist
basics.summary:
I am a DevOps Specialist with an eye for automation since day one. Versatile team player with a deep commitment to a reliable and successful business, I am eager to learn every day at a high pace.

Based in Sofrecom in Tunisia , I am keen on working remotely too.

_This resume is built and deployed with a [GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow](https://github.com/nizarrwk/resume)._

work.summary: In relation with the Management, I manage 4 teams RCD,AGC, PSC and BAD3 (Project Managers, Product Owners, Technical Managers, Design and Development Engineers, Exploitation Engineers) and I stimulate their performance by coordinating the projects, I support the project managers in the development of relevant technical solutions.
highlights: **Lead**: Animate, coordinate, develop and manage the cluster to achieve the objectives set within the strategy determined by the project leaders.
**Architecture** : Design application deployment architecture and virtual infrastructure
**Orchestration**: Orchestrate the provisioning, load balancing, dynamic configuration, monitoring and spend optimization of servers in the cloud environment.
**Monitoring**: Customize monitoring and alerting for new technologies and services
**Post-Delivery Analysis**: Perform root cause analysis of production impacting issues, including opening problem cases with vendors and driving them to conclusion.
*AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Nagios, Prometheus, Python, Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Nexus, Shell, Git, Agile*

work.summary: Technical coordination between the different project stakeholders: Collaboration with development teams, QA test, Releases managers, operating teams and infrastructure teams to maintain a quality level of deliverables throughout the flow deployment.
highlights: Recommendations and implementation of automation to the extent possible for each stage of the deliverables flow (Change Report, Merges, Deliverables Generation, Unit Testing / Integration / Acceptance, Deployment).
Implementation and management of the various functionalities of the continuous integration platform.
Documentation of all DevOps processes and practices put in place.
Animation of different scrum ceremonies.
Support of the POs on the preparation and prioritization phases of the different sprints.
Sensitization of teams and organization to the risks and management of the technical debt.
Drafting of sprint reports based on feedback from the team and relevant indicators (US burndown, team Mood, Velocity, Definition of Done, cycle time, lead time, etc.).
Provide estimations for new development tasks .
High and low level design for new development components.
Implementation of new components and perform unitary tests .
Prepare technical and delivery documents (Release/Delivery Note, Administration Guide and User Guide).
*Docker, Python, Make, Jira, Confluence, GitLab, Jenkins, Agile, Shell*

work.summary: Design and programming desktop and Mobile applications ( Android OS)
highlights: **Automated deployment** tests against J2EE application servers
Integrated automated tests to a Jenkins CI environment
Develop Unit Test plans
*XML, Ant, Jenkins, Robot Framework, SQL, PL/SQL, Agile*

education.institution: High School of computer Science and Multimedia(ISIMS)
education.area: MASTER LEVEL DEGREE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE

skills.name: Infra as Code and Config Mgmt

certifications.title: Tech Star FY21
certifications.summary: Each year, Accenture selects a handful of employees for this truly unique leadership program and train them for 6 months on leadership roles.

certifications.title: Inventor Award Program FY19
certifications.summary: Each year, Accenture celebrates unique ideas and an innovation mindset through the Inventor Award Program, which recognizes and rewards employees who file patent applications or have been granted patents in the previous fiscal year.

certifications.title: Accenture Celebrates Excellence(ACE) - FY19 Q4
certifications.summary:
Awarded the Client and Customer Award in the individual category for outstanding contribution to client's business outcomes.

The ACE awards program is the formal entity Rewards and Recognition program intended to recognize individuals and teams for demonstrating behavior that contributes to the success of the organization. It celebrates the true spirit of our colleagues who have performed ‘Greater Than’ and applauds people who have consistently delivered results that exceed expectations, individually and as teams.

certifications.title: Accenture Celebrates Excellence(ACE) - FY18 Q3
certifications.summary:
Awarded the Future Ready Skills Award in the individual category for consistently applying IT skills in client projects and positioning Accenture for future growth.

The ACE awards program is the formal entity Rewards and Recognition program intended to recognize individuals and teams for demonstrating behavior that contributes to the success of the organization. It celebrates the true spirit of our colleagues who have performed ‘Greater Than’ and applauds people who have consistently delivered results that exceed expectations, individually and as teams.

interests.name: Traveling
interests.summary: My favorite way to experience new cultures. Making and planning annual trips to different countries is a challenge I like to embrace.
